name: Alone (itch) (Jaydon Loar)
description:
This game is shooter where you must try to survive an alien invasion all alone. You have to try to kill as many aliens as possible. Unfortunately, we ran out of time and due to many errors, were unable to debug the game and import many of our custom assets (Like the map in the cover photo).

This is for the Virtus Winter Game Jam 2018.

-Made by a passionate team
